network.server

Class SocketClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Observable<java.lang.String>
      • network.server.SocketClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ClientConnection

    public class SocketClientConnection
extends Observable<java.lang.String>
implements ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
    Class for the management of the socket connection with a client.

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        private boolean isActive()

      • run

        public void run()
        Main thread of the class. Once accepted the name of the player from the socket it adds the player to the waiting room or makes a reconnection. Then it reads the strings from the socket and notifies them to the RemoteView.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • send

        private void send(java.lang.String message)
        Changes the message to handle Regular Expressions then sends it through the socket.
        Parameters:
        message - to send

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection with the client.
        Specified by:

      • close

        private void close()
        Signals the server this connection will be closed and then closes the connection.
